text:
e="preserve">Dumitru Munteanu (3 July 1932 – 20 June 2020) was a Romanian footballer. He was born in Bucharest. He spent his entire career playing alongside his twin brother Anton Munteanu. He played for the national team in 1962. He played with Petrolul Ploiești from 1956 to 1966.
Dumitru died on 20 June 2020 in Bucharest, aged 87.
